Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.onedimensional

Clustering algorithms for one-dimensional data.

See: Description


  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KNNKernelDensityMinimaClustering<V extends NumberVector>
    Cluster one-dimensional data by splitting the data set on local minima after performing kernel density estimation.
    KNNKernelDensityMinimaClustering.Parameterizer<V extends NumberVector>
    Parameterization class.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    KNNKernelDensityMinimaClustering.Mode
    Estimation mode.
